conclusion: Violation of Art. 8 (if deportation order executed);Not necessary to examine Art. 3;Lack of jurisdiction (injunction to State)
docname: CASE OF NASRI v. FRANCE - [Russian Translation]
issue: Law of 9 September 1986 ; Orders of 2 November 1945 and 29 October 1981 concerning the conditions of entry and residence of aliens in France, sections 23 and 24
scl: Moustaquim v. Belgium judgment of 18 February 1991, Series A no. 193;Beldjoudi v. France judgment of 26 March 1992, Series A no. 234-A, p. 27, para. 74;Saïdi v. France judgment of 20 September 1993, Series A no. 261-C, p. 57, para. 47
